title: La isla de las tentaciones: Argentina & Chile
overview: Dive into the thrilling journey of "Temptation Island: Argentina & Chile". Four couples embark on an island in the Gulf of Mexico to challenge the limits of their love. With Florencia Peña and Benjamín Vicuña as hosts, they'll confront doubts, jealousy, and infidelities. Can the couples flirt with temptation without succumbing to it or will they be swayed by the exhilarating call of the forbidden?
